title: saNNava nam mAtu
sahitya:
saNNava nam mAtu olla hAri hELamma kaNNu muccalADuvAga kAku mADala yAtakamma


caraNam 1    mosara kaddare nAvu moreyiDabandudilla hosa kucangaLa muTTi pOdanalle 
hasu maganariyade avanu Agali meluva bisuruha moggeyendu piDidarEnAyite
    caraNam 2    navanItavanu bEDe nAvendudillavamma yuvatiyanudaradi kaTTira bEDa 
avanu Agali meluva Alada haNNendu savi kaNDu bEDidare adake sAdhisa bandu
    caraNam 3    bhUmige laNDanu namma puruSarillada hinde kAmisi kaNDana hAge karavudaidAne 
prEmadim purandara viTTalanna nenedare kAmita kalpa vrkSavu kai sEride
